alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 3:05AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Calhoun County. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
